mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT_HIT, PRODUCT_IMG_DATA, PRODUCT_IMG_TYPE, OPTION_PRICE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY OPTION_PRICE DESC)ROWN2 FROM (SELECT PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT.PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_HIT, PRODUCT.CATE_CODE, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_IMG_DATA, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_IMG_TYPE,PRODUCT_OPTION.OPTION_PRICE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE ORDER BY PRODUCT_OPTION.OPTION_PRICE ASC) ROWN FROM PRODUCT, PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE= PRODUCT_OPTION.PRODUCT_CODE)WHERE ROWN=1) WHERE PRODUCT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' AND ROWN2 BETWEEN #{page} AND #{page1} ORDER BY OPTION_PRICE DESC;
